-  @key headful

-  @summary Text fields in JPopupMenu structure do not receive focus in hosted

-
-<html>
-<head>
-    <title>Testing Menus</title>
-</head>
-<body>
-<applet id="ownerTester"
-        name="Testing Owner"
-        code="FindOwnerTest.class"
-        width="250" height="150">
-</applet>
-</body>
-</html>
